debates: Pineapple is a good pizza topping.
Pineapple is a horrible pizza topping.
Dogs are better pets than cats.
Cats are better pets than dogs.
Summer is a better season than winter.
Winter is a better season than summer.
What type of music reigns supreme?
Classical music is better than modern music.
Modern music is better than classical music.
Pluto should be considered a planet.
Pluto should not be considered a planet.
Does playing video games help make you smarter?
Playing video games makes you smarter.
Playing video games doesn't make you smarter.
Socks with sandals is a respectable fashion statement.
Socks with sandals is a horrible fashion statement.
If a tree falls in a forest and no one is around ...
If a tree falls in a forest and no one is around, it does not make a sound.
If a tree falls in a forest and no one is around, it makes a sound.
If you replace all parts of a ship ...
It is still the same ship.
If you replace all parts of a ship it is a new ship.
If you replace all parts of a ship it is still the same ship.
Competitive video games should be considered a sport.
Competitive video games should not be considered a sport.
Blue is a better color than red.
Red is a better color than blue.
The chicken came before the egg.
The egg came before the chicken.
The pen is mightier than the sword.
The sword is mightier than the pen.
Does the sun revolve the earth?
How many holes are in a straw?
